name: Greedy Pugs
description:
Use Arrow Keys or A & D Keys to PLAY!

Play as Monty or Archie and eat as much food as you can, build up your score and compete with friends to fight for top of the leaderboard, grab the perks to create a FOOD Frenzy to boost your score even higher.

-- FREE FOREVER - NO ADS - NO IN APP PURCHASES -- FREE UPDATES

Includes:

- HIGH XP Achievements (Level Up on GPG fast)

- Twitter Integration

- Google Play Game Services

- Online Leaderboards

- Future-proofed (Updates Guaranteed)

Credits:

Ross Thompson - Game/Graphics Creator

Fletcher Adams - Character graphics

FoxSynergy- Theme Music (CC)

Devin-Busha - Background image (Wood)

OpenGameArt.Org - Misc Sound Effects (CC)
